attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To give monetary funding to political parties from the state. The funding to be decided by all voters at a general election having two secret votes. One vote to go to the political party whom the voter might want to achieve political office. The second vote for nominating the same party or another standing party to receive twenty pounds from the state to use for its political funding. And to always make public all private donations to political parties that are over fifty pounds.
